Package controllers

Class CampStudentController

java.lang.Object
controllers.CampStudentController
public class CampStudentController extends Object
Controller specifically for methods only accessed by Student These methods affect the Camp object/database
Version:
26/11/2023
Author:
seanl

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CampStudentController(entity.CampDatabase campDB)
    Make a new CampStudentController object for the respective user interface

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    checkCampClash(entity.Student student, entity.Camp newCamp)
    Method to supplement the registerCamp method Checks the dates of camps available to the student If the dates conflict with the dates of a camp that the student has currently registered for, the conflicting camp will not be displayed
    void
    registerCamps(entity.Student student)
    Registers a student for a particular camp available to him Student can register as either an attendee or a Camp Committee Member
    int
    selectCCM()
    Method to supplement the registerCamp method Lets the currently logged in Student choose whether they want to register as an attendee or Camp Committee Member
    void
    viewCamps(entity.Student student)
    Views all the camps that can be viewed by the student Camps displayed depends on the camp's visbility and faculty
    void
    viewOwnCamps(entity.Student student)
    Displays the camps that a student has currently registered for
    void
    withdraw(entity.Student student)
    Removes a student from a camp that they have registered for Student will be unable to register for a camp that they have withdrawn from The withdrawn camp will be saved to a student using the student database

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Registers a student for a particular camp available to him Student can register as either an attendee or a Camp Committee Member
      Parameters:
      student - student that is currently logged in

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw(entity.Student student)
      Removes a student from a camp that they have registered for Student will be unable to register for a camp that they have withdrawn from The withdrawn camp will be saved to a student using the student database
      Parameters:
      student - student that is currently logged in

      public void viewOwnCamps(entity.Student student)
      Displays the camps that a student has currently registered for
      Parameters:
      student - student that is currently logged in

    • selectCCM

      public int selectCCM()
      Method to supplement the registerCamp method Lets the currently logged in Student choose whether they want to register as an attendee or Camp Committee Member
      Returns:
      Student's selection

    • checkCampClash

      public boolean checkCampClash(entity.Student student, entity.Camp newCamp)
      Method to supplement the registerCamp method Checks the dates of camps available to the student If the dates conflict with the dates of a camp that the student has currently registered for, the conflicting camp will not be displayed
      Parameters:
      student - student that is currently logged in
      newCamp - camp that will be checked for clashes
      Returns:
      true if there is a clash in dates, false if not
